8.text:
ears.boxes.left = boxFromPoint(
    element.left - radius * 2,
    y,
    radius,
    radius
)

5.text:
ears.boxes.up = boxFromPoint(
    x,
    element.top - radius * 2,
    radius,
    radius
)

9.text:
right = element.left + element.width
bottom = element.top + element.height

11.text:
ears.boxes.down = boxFromPoint(
    x,
    bottom + radius * 2,
    radius,
    radius
)

12.text:
ears.target = undefined
ears.lineTarget = undefined
ears.hideEar = false
ears.selected = undefined

10.text:
ears.boxes.right = boxFromPoint(
    right + radius * 2,
    y,
    radius,
    radius
)
